name: 二次域
complexity: O(1) for basic operations; factorization and unit solving depend on specific problems.
scenarios: Solving quadratic integer equations (e.g., x² + y² = n, x² - xy + y² = n)
Analyzing Gaussian integers and Eisenstein integers
Finding integer points on circles and ellipses
Solving Pythagorean triples and related Diophantine equations
Prime factorization in quadratic integer rings
extensions: Pell equations for real quadratic fields
